overview: Shit  (1969)  Never completely finished during its original production, this snarky comic piece was rediscovered in director Penelope Spheeris’ vaults in 2010 and preserved “as is.”  The titular substance plays a key role in determining an outmoded man’s role in a changing society.  16mm, color, 4 min.  Director: Penelope Spheeris. 1969.
title: Shit
